Description.Text: Ideally located in the prime touristic area of Potts Point, The Bayswater Sydney promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. The hotel offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. To be found at the hotel are free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, express check-in/check-out, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. For reliable service and professional staff, The Bayswater Sydney caters to your needs.
